abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32484159, pmid32809963, pmid32792471, pmid32813879, pmid32530585, pmid32806998, pmid32808424, pmid32804792, pmid32815036, pmid32703421, pmid32813220, pmid32810202, pmid32810081, pmid32830154, pmid32813967, pmid32804580, pmid32786309, pmid32809274
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.08.25
